features: 【Professional Portable Steamer for Clothes】: Rated voltage: 110V, 970 W high power, softens fibers and removes wrinkles quickly; 100 ml water tank; 20 s to warm up, quick ironing in 3 minutes, and you can go out exquisitely in just one song time. The front of the heating plate is designed in a triangular tip shape, and 360-degree ironing without dead angle, which allows flexible ironing of narrow areas such as buttons, plackets, and collars.

【2-in-1 Wet & Dry Steam Iron】: The micro clothing steamer has both dry and wet ironing experience to meet individual ironing needs. Plug in and they can be heated to 302°F in 10S, you can iron your clothes directly, for the better and faster ironing effect, you can also press the steam button to release steam and then iron the clothes.

【Home Travel Iron for Clothes】: The travel iron mini with steam adopts titanium panel heating, constant temperature of 302°F heating ironing does not hurt clothes. can for ironing organic fabrics, nylon blend, wool, cotton, linen and much more. can effectively removes crease and wrinkle of your clothing. Please note: Since we need to test each iron with water, there will be a small number of water stains remaining, which is normal.

【Steamer for Clothes Travel Size】: The travel clothes steamer uses a 100 ml integrated water tank design, it is convenient to add water with the filling cup to prevent splashes, you can check the water level in the tank at any time. The handle can have three angled points to meet different iron usage, and can be rotated 0°-90°-180° to adjust the space for holding the handle.

【Family Travel Essentials】: The powerful portable mini clothing iron efficiency makes life more refined, auto ironing machine easily removes wrinkles on fabrics such as clothes, shirts, curtains, bed sheets, plush, cotton, linen, and other fabrics. Handheld iron can save space, is a lightweight, compact design, and very suitable for travel and outing use. It can be easily put into suitcases and backpacks and can be easily carried anytime, anywhere.

【ATTENTION】: (1) It must be fully preheated when wet ironing: after plugging in the power supply, it is recommended to wait at least 20s to preheat before pressing the steam button. If there is no preheating, the water has not yet reached the steam temperature, the high temperature and pressure in the water tank can not atomize the water. (2) Avoid turning it completely upside down during use. (3) Pour excess water out the tank after use.

【ATTENTION】: If you are traveling to Europe or other countries, please use a plug with voltage conversion, and make sure it supports high-power appliances, yes, our iron power is 970W, without voltage conversion function of the adapter will cause damage to the steam iron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and compact
reviews.reviewText: This steam iron works so well, I can't believe it. Heats up and produces steam almost instantaneously. And it does a wonderful job. I won't leave home without it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worked well but only once!
reviews.reviewText: We bought it for a trip, we use it once and it worked perfectly, but we were surprised when on our trip it just doesn’t heat and leaks a lot if we try to use it as steamer.Update: the seller contacted me and offered a full refund/replacement, great customer service that’s why I am changing my rate! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact for travel and good sub for iron
reviews.reviewText: The intent for this was purely to have a compact travel steamer. The steamer arm folds up nicely to fit in a carry on or full size luggage. As a bonus this is also an iron. I do not iron -- I prefer to just steam clothing and realized this is also a nice (and inexpensive and compact) substitute to having a full size iron when I need it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Did not function as described
reviews.reviewText: This was such a disappointment. It is not easy to use, the steamer function never work despite all my efforts, it leaked water and was loud. I really wanted to like this because it was really pretty and a great size. But I had to return it because it just did not function as claimed. It did heat up and work as a regular iron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS STEAMER!
reviews.reviewText: This handy steamer is fantastic!! works so good and is great for all clothing materials. I took it with me for dance competition to steam out the wrinkles and it was amazing.. so cute and portable... love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not the most effective steamer I’ve ever owned but adequate. It’s also very cute to look at, so it’s easy to leave out. Runs out of water quickly and spurts a bit. Works better as a small iron than a steamer for some tough wrinkles but does a good enough job for the price and ease of travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Muy práctica y fácil de usar.
reviews.reviewText: Me gustó mucho como plancha, es fácil de usar y no quita mucho espacio.
Really does the job!!! Heat up time is very fast, love it!!! Caution: very hot!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.8ish stars - works well but you need to "know" how to steam clean
reviews.reviewText: It's a simple iron steamer that swivels making it all fancy.The ironing part works just fine, I applied a patch to a t-shirt without any issues.The steaming portion is hit or miss depending on material and how strong you apply the steam. I've owned a dedicated suit steamer in the past and this one works not as well honestly. I can't really fault it though as it's a dual purpose iron..so something needs to take a hit for the versatility. If you have never ever owned a steaming shirt machine before then yes I would say there will be some frustration!I needed to reduce the steam setting and go slower, otherwise it would flood the shirt and make it damp. Not exactly the result I was looking for but workable.Overall if you don't want to invest in two different machines yes it works, dry ironing is the strong point here and you need to fiddle a bit to find your appropriate settings vs materials on the steaming side.The original price tag when sent for review was way too high, but I see they dropped it significantly to around fifty dollars as I am writing this - so for that price yes, it's worth taking a look at too see if it suits your dual needs, as a regular single iron will cost just as much.One noted point to the company though - I missed the standard "pointy" style nose of regular irons while using this as it's quite effective at certain spots when putting patches and stuff on clothing. The tiny point on this one I found didn't quite satisfy that and needs to be a bit more pronounced.
Me encanta es pequeña y súper buena plancha genial, yo la uso para planchar laRopa de mi bebé pero es perfecta para cualquier prenda

reviews.reviewTitle: The only iron you’ll ever need.
reviews.reviewText: We have a conventional iron and one of those hanging steamer things, but now I’m getting rid of both of them, this thing does it all!For starts, build quality is 11/10! This is built very well, all of the fit and finishes are solid. The handle swivels in and out firmly and locks in with an affirmative snap.Aesthetically this steam iron is absolutely gorgeous! Very nice device, it’s got like a retro but modern look. Also there is a very nice analogue temperature dial right on top.Functionally this iron is awesome. I ironed my shirts and collars on an ironing board, then my wife turned up the steam and steamed her blouse on a hanger. On full throttle it pumps ALOT of steam, I tried to get a picture but steam is a tough thing to get a photo of.This is a beautiful and very good quality steamer/ iron and I highly recommend. If you’re on the market for a new iron or steamer this. One is the right choice.
It's very convenient, and the ironing is very neat
